price: 71. Waxay caabudaan Alle sokadi wax uusan u soo dejin wax xujo ah, iyo waxaa aysan u lahayn wax cilmi ah, daalimiintana (gaalada, mushrikiinta, iwm) ma heli doonaan wax u soo gargaara (shafeeca Aakhirada).
arabic: وَيَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَمۡ يُنَزِّلۡ بِهِۦ سُلۡطَٰنٗا وَمَا لَيۡسَ لَهُم بِهِۦ عِلۡمٞۗ وَمَا لِلظَّٰلِمِينَ مِن نَّصِيرٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wayaʿbudūna min dūni al-lahi mā lam yunazzil bihi sul'ṭānan wamā laysa lahum bihi ʿil'mun wamā lilẓẓālimīna min naṣīrin
